description:
This invention is a Ruby "gem" (library) that provides clients for ENERGY STAR Portfolio Manager (ESPM) Web Services,
Inventive features:
100% coverage of version 18.0 of the ESPM API.
Automated mapping between ESPM XML schemas and Ruby objects.
Clients for both the "live" and "test" ESPM API environments.
Debugging mode with HTTP request/response logging.
name: pnnl/portfoliomanager-rb
